tool_description: Suggests alternative wood species that meet similar requirements but may offer cost savings or better availability.

max_price_increase.description: Maximum acceptable price increase as percentage (0-100%)

must_match_properties.description: Properties that must be matched (hardness, grain, color, workability)

geographic_preference.description: Preferred origin region (local, domestic, imported, any)

error_messages: Unknown original species: The specified species is not in the database
Invalid price increase: Must be between 0 and 100 percent
Invalid properties: Use combinations of [hardness, grain, color, workability]
Invalid geographic preference: Use one of [local, domestic, imported, any]
No alternatives found: No species meet the specified criteria and constraints
usage: Provide the original species selection, maximum acceptable price increase, and properties that must be preserved. Optionally specify geographic and sustainability preferences.

price_differences.description: Price difference percentages vs original species

similarity_scores.description: Property similarity scores (0-100) for each alternative

availability_ratings.description: Availability ratings (excellent, good, fair, poor) for each alternative

key_differences.description: Notable differences from original species for each alternative
